home.page_title: Full Stack Web Developer & Junior Pentester | Cyril Deschamps
home.page_description: Cyril Deschamps, full-stack web developer with 2 years of experience, currently training to become a junior pentester. Expert in developing high-performance applications and IT security. Based in France, studying at an engineering school.
home.page_hide_header: Portfolio of Cyril Deschamps - Full-Stack Web Developer & Junior Pentester

developer.title: Developer
developer.description: As a full-stack developer, skilled in ReactJS and NodeJS, I build high-performance and scalable web applications.

software_engineering.title: Software Engineering
software_engineering.description: As a software engineer, I design and develop applications while adhering to design principles and design patterns.

security_audit.title: Security Audits
security_audit.description: As a junior pentester, I conduct security audits to ensure the reliability and protection of applications.

self_introduction.title: Web Developer Training in Cybersecurity Focused on Pentesting
self_introduction.description:
I am Cyril Deschamps, a student at an engineering school in France, with extensive experience in web development and a specialization in security audits. I have completed several freelance web projects, including an e-commerce platform with secure payment integration.
I actively train on TryHackMe and HackTheBox to improve my pentesting (penetration testing) and offensive security skills.
My goal is to combine development and cybersecurity to help companies secure their applications and infrastructures.

github_actions.title: GitHub Actions
desc: ○ CD: Docker and Nginx on VPS

continuous_learning.title: Continuous Learning and Passion for Knowledge
continuous_learning.paragraph: Passionate about full-stack web development and offensive cybersecurity, I make sure to always stay up-to-date by training on platforms such as TryHackMe and HackTheBox to strengthen my offensive security skills. Technological monitoring is a priority, and building a network with experts from various IT fields has been highly enriching.

collaboration_adaptability.title: Collaboration and Adaptability
collaboration_adaptability.paragraph: Thanks to my freelance experience, I have understood the importance of effective project management and smooth communication. I strive to provide concrete solutions tailored to the specific needs of each client, paying particular attention to the clarity of visual specifications for better project understanding.

curiosity_perseverance.title: Curiosity and Perseverance
curiosity_perseverance.paragraph: Whether in full-stack web development or offensive cybersecurity, I am determined to identify vulnerabilities and propose robust solutions to protect applications and infrastructures. My curiosity, the driving force behind my learning, allows me to quickly adapt to new environments and is a major asset in my pentesting (penetration testing) activities.

quality_security.title: Commitment to Quality and Security
quality_security.paragraph: I strive to deliver secure and high-performance solutions while rigorously adhering to best practices in software development and engineering. The design and planning phase is essential.
